btrplace.solver.choco.constraint

Interface ChocoConstraint

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MisplacedVMsEstimator
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CObjective
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CAmong, CBan, CFence, CGather, CKilled, CLonely, CMaxOnline, CMinMTTR, COffline, COnline, COverbook, CPreserve, CQuarantine, CReady, CResourceCapacity, CRoot, CRunning, CRunningCapacity, CSequentialVMTransitions, CSleeping, CSplit, CSplitAmong, CSpread

    public interface ChocoConstraint
extends MisplacedVMsEstimator
    An interface to describe a constraint implementation for the solver.
    Author:
    Fabien Hermenier

      boolean inject(ReconfigurationProblem rp)
      Inject the constraint into the problem.

      • Methods inherited from interface btrplace.solver.choco.MisplacedVMsEstimator

        getMisPlacedVMs

    • Method Detail

      • inject

        boolean inject(ReconfigurationProblem rp)
        throws SolverException
        Inject the constraint into the problem.
        Parameters:
        rp - the problem
        Returns:
        true if the injection succeeded, false if the problem is sure to not have a solution
        Throws:
        SolverException - if an error occurred while injecting.
